attributes.action: Keep Formula One (F1) Off Pay To View TV (Sky)
attributes.additional_details: It has been announced that BBC will loose its exclusivity to transmit the Formula One Grand Prix races live from between 2012 to 2018.  Instead those races will be screened on Sky Sports (pay per view).  The Grand Prix should be kept on terresterial TV channel (BBC, ITV etc) to ensure non-satellite TV subcribers are not disadvantages by only being shown the highlights rather than the live races.
